Name: Retro Karting 22
About the game: It's the late 90s - a quiet summer night - you enter a small arcade to see all the classic arcade machines before you, out in the distance you see a new game, as you approach it, the sounds and lights draw your attention. Welcome to Retro Karting 22 . Your reaction time, decision making and driving skills will be tested to the limit! Choose your character and kart and drift your way to victory! Race your own ghost images in this single player, time trial based, indie karting game. Time Trial Racing: Compete against your own ghost images to increase your times Single Player: no internet connection required 3 Racing Tracks 2 Playable Characters 2 Playable Karts Retro Karting 22 is a thrill-inducing racing game, developed by two independent game developers in 2022.
